original: @132b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @132b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: badzra t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Vajratārāsādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs //
analyzed: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs //
translated: Vajra Tārā Sādhana

original: rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Vajra Tārā.

original: sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis //
translated: By the ritual of fire offering,

original: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
translated: accomplishing all desired aims,

original: rdo rje sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: rdo rje sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: the method of accomplishing Vajra Tārā

original: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: will now be explained.

original: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams su 'gyur te /
translated: The mantra words are as follows:

original: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
analyzed: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
translated: Namo 'rhya avalokiteśvarāya

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya /
translated: bodhisattvāya

original: ma h'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a satv'a ya /
translated: mahāsattvāya

original: ma h'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
translated: mahākāruṇikāya

original: tadya th'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'am pra dusht'am ma ma kri te dzambha ya stam bha ya /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dusht'am pra dusht'am ma ma kri te dzambha ya stam bha ya /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture sarva duṣṭaṃ praduṣṭaṃ mama kṛte jaṃbhaya staṃbhaya

original: mo ha ya /
analyzed: mo ha ya /
translated: mohaya

original: bandha ya h'um h'um h'um /
analyzed: bandha ya h'um h'um h'um /
translated: vaṃdhaya huṃ huṃ huṃ

original: phat phat phat /
analyzed: phat phat phat /
translated: phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ

original: sarba dusht'am stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba dusht'am stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
translated: sarva duṣṭaṃ stambhani tāre svāhā.

original: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: In the center of the Mātṛkā maṇḍala,

original: lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya //
translated: meditate on Goddess Tārā.

original: phyag brgyad zhal bzhi dang ldan pa /🔽rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: phyag brgyad zhal bzhi dang ldan pa / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
translated: He has four faces and eight arms.🔽One should visualize him, golden-colored,

original: gser gyi mdog can bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: gser gyi mdog can bsgom bya ste //
translated: adorned with all the ornaments,

original: gzhon nu ma yi mtshan ldan brjod //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yi mtshan ldan brjod //
translated: endowed with the marks of a youthful maiden.

original: rdo rje nyi mas dbang bskur skyes //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi mas dbang bskur skyes //
translated: He is born from the consecration of the vajra sun,

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan che //
translated: the great diadem of the five buddhas,

original: lang tsho gzhon zhid  yid du 'ong //
analyzed: lang tsho gzhon zhid  yid du 'ong //
translated: youthful, fresh, and attractive,

original: gser gyi rna rgyan g-yo ba can //
analyzed: gser gyi rna rgyan g-yo ba can //
translated: with dangling golden earrings,

original: 'od zer dmar pos rnam brgyan cing //
analyzed: 'od zer dmar pos rnam brgyan cing //
translated: adorned with red light,

original: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la bzhugs //🔽rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung ;
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la bzhugs // rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung ;
translated: seated on a variegated lotus seat,🔽holding a vajra, a noose, and a conch,🔽and an arrow in his right hands,

original: / mda' rnams bsnams pa g-yas kyi phyag / rdo rje lcags kyu autpal gzhu //
analyzed: / mda' rnams bsnams pa g-yas kyi phyag / rdo rje lcags kyu autpal gzhu //
translated: and a vajra hook, a lotus, a bow,🔽and a threatening gesture in his left hands.

original: sdigs mdzub rnams ni g-yon gyi phyag / rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub rnams ni g-yon gyi phyag / rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: By the yoga of the vajra posture,

original: sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should accomplish the three worlds.

original: mdun du me tog sgrol ma ni //
analyzed: mdun du me tog sgrol ma ni //
translated: In front of him is Flower Tara,

original: dkar mo shin tu yid 'ong ma //🔽aom yig rnam pa @133a * //
analyzed: dkar mo shin tu yid 'ong ma // aom yig rnam pa @133a * //
translated: white, very attractive,

original: nyid las skyes //
analyzed: nyid las skyes //
translated: born from the letter OṂ,

original: me tog phreng ba phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba phyag na bsnams //
translated: holding a garland of flowers in her hand.

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste //
translated: She has one face and two arms,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: and is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: lho phyogs bdug spos sgrol ma ni //
analyzed: lho phyogs bdug spos sgrol ma ni //
translated: In the south, the incense Tārā

original: gzugs mdzes sku mdog nag mo ste //
analyzed: gzugs mdzes sku mdog nag mo ste //
translated: is beautiful, with a dark-colored body,

original: bdug spos snod ni phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: bdug spos snod ni phyag na bsnams //
translated: holding a censer in her hand,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: and adorned with all the ornaments.

original: nub phyogs mar me'i sgrol ma ni //🔽rgyal chen sku mdog ser mo ste //
analyzed: nub phyogs mar me'i sgrol ma ni // rgyal chen sku mdog ser mo ste //
translated: In the west, the lamp Tārā

original: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can //
analyzed: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can //
translated: is the color of gold, with swaying earrings of gold,

original: phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams //
analyzed: phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams //
translated: and holds a lamp in her hand.

original: byang phyogs dri yi sgrol ma ni //
analyzed: byang phyogs dri yi sgrol ma ni //
translated: In the north, the perfume Tārā

original: dri yi dung chos phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: dri yi dung chos phyag na bsnams //
translated: holds a conch of perfume in her hand,

original: lha mo sku mdog dmar 'bar ma //
analyzed: lha mo sku mdog dmar 'bar ma //
translated: and the goddess blazes with red light.

original: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgom bya //
analyzed: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgom bya //
translated: One should visualize the essence maṇḍala.🔽Then, one should visualize the gate guardians

original: lcags kyu la sogs dbye ba yis //🔽de nas sgo skyong bsgom par bya //
analyzed: lcags kyu la sogs dbye ba yis // de nas sgo skyong bsgom par bya //
translated: by dividing the hook and so on.

original: shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma //
analyzed: shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma //
translated: At the eastern gate is Vajra Hook,

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: with one face and two arms,

original: sku mdog nag mo bzhin mdzes ma //
analyzed: sku mdog nag mo bzhin mdzes ma //
translated: dark-colored, with a beautiful face,🔽and holding a hook in her hand.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu autpal phyag / lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu autpal phyag / lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma /
translated: at the southern gate, Vajra noose,

original: sku mdog ser mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
analyzed: sku mdog ser mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
translated: yellow, with a terrifying face.

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: She has one face and two hands,

original: phyag na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams //
translated: holding a vajra and a noose.

original: nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma //
analyzed: nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma //
translated: At the western gate, Vajra chain,

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: one-faced and two-handed,

original: sku mdog dmar mo bzhin 'jigs ma //🔽rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo bzhin 'jigs ma // rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag na bsnams //
translated: red, with a terrifying face,🔽holding a vajra chain in her hand.

original: byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma //
analyzed: byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma //
translated: At the northern gate, Vajra bell,

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: one-faced and two-handed,

original: sku mdog dkar mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
analyzed: sku mdog dkar mo bzhin 'jigs ma //
translated: white, with a terrifying face,

original: phyag na rdo rje dril bu bsnams//
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje dril bu bsnams//
translated: holding a vajra and a bell.

original: 'di rnams g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs //
analyzed: 'di rnams g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs //
translated: They stand with right legs extended,

original: nyi ma'i gdan la nyi 'od bzhin //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan la nyi 'od bzhin //
translated: on sun seats, like the sun's rays,

original: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas 'khrigs //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas 'khrigs //
translated: surrounded by a garland of flames.

original: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par blta //🔽steng du gtsug gtor rnam rgyal ma //
analyzed: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par blta // steng du gtsug gtor rnam rgyal ma //
translated: They are seen adorned with snake ornaments.🔽Above, imagine Uṣṇīṣa-Vijayā,

original: 'og tu gnod mdzes ma nyid bsgom //
analyzed: 'og tu gnod mdzes ma nyid bsgom //
translated: and below, Uṣṇīṣa-Bhairavī.

original: 'khor lo sprul gyi zhags bsgoms nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo sprul gyi zhags bsgoms nas //
translated: Having meditated on the noose of the emanation wheel,

original: sngags ni 'phro zhing bzlas par bya ;
analyzed: sngags ni 'phro zhing bzlas par bya ;
translated: one should recite the mantra while radiating [light].

original: / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
translated: Om tare tuttare ture svāhā.

original: yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu //
analyzed: yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu //
translated: With the ten syllables, the ten goddesses,

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu la brten //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu la brten //
translated: one should rely on the ten perfections.

original: bsgom pa rab tu sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bsgom pa rab tu sbyor ba yis //
translated: By applying the meditation,

original: don rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub //🔽sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: don rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub // sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa'i //
translated: all goals will be accomplished.🔽This supreme mantra,

original: sngags mchog 'di ni gtso bo ste //
analyzed: sngags mchog 'di ni gtso bo ste //
translated: which is revered by all buddhas, is the chief one.

original: bklags pa yis ni don 'grub 'gyur //
analyzed: bklags pa yis ni don 'grub 'gyur //
translated: By reciting it, one's goals will be accomplished.

original: myur du rdo rje'i gur bsgoms nas//
analyzed: myur du rdo rje'i gur bsgoms nas//
translated: Having quickly meditated on the vajra tent,

original: sngags 'dis gos kyi snal lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas //
analyzed: sngags 'dis gos kyi snal lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas //
translated: with this mantra, one should enchant a thread seven times,

original: mdud pa byas na 'jigs bcas gang du 'gro yang 'jigs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mdud pa byas na 'jigs bcas gang du 'gro yang 'jigs mi 'gyur //
translated: and make a knot. Wherever one goes, even if it is a fearful place, one will not be afraid.

original: stag dang chom po chu srin seng ge glang chen ma he sprul //
analyzed: stag dang chom po chu srin seng ge glang chen ma he sprul //
translated: Tigers, hyenas, crocodiles, lions, elephants, buffaloes, snakes,

original: dom dang dred sogs rnams la ming dran tsam gyis 'jigs med 'gyur //
analyzed: dom dang dred sogs rnams la ming dran tsam gyis 'jigs med 'gyur //
translated: bears, and so forth - by merely remembering the name, one will be fearless.

original: sngags 'dis autpal la brgya rtsa brgyad @133b sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags 'dis autpal la brgya rtsa brgyad @133b sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By this mantra, if one performs a homa of blue lotus flowers one hundred and eight times, whoever one desires will be brought under one's power.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki me ba sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a zhes so //
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki me ba sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a zhes so //
translated: Om tare tuttare ture amuki me vasam anaya svāhā.

original: de bzhin du sngags 'dis bya rog gi sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas te khang par spas na zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags 'dis bya rog gi sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas te khang par spas na zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, by this mantra, if one recites it thirty-two times over a crow feather and places it in the house, within seven days they will be expelled.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsa la pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni de ba dattam autstsha ta ya h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsa la pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni de ba dattam autstsha ta ya h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om tare tuttare ture cala pracala śigru gamini deva dattam utsādaya hum hum phat.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, there is another application:

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka aa bhi dh'a n'am ku m'a r'i ma hyam byi b'a he na ty'a:pi t'a pra yatstsha tu sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka aa bhi dh'a n'am ku m'a r'i ma hyam byi b'a he na ty'a:pi t'a pra yatstsha tu sv'a h'a /
translated: Om tare tuttare ture amuka abhidhanam kumārīm mahāyām bhavāhenatyaḥ pitā prayacchatu svāhā.🔽 The seed of madana,🔽and likewise the fruit of madana,

original: myos byed gtum po'i sa bon dang // de bzhin myos byed 'bras bu dang // mya ngan med pa'i me tog bcas //
analyzed: myos byed gtum po'i sa bon dang // de bzhin myos byed 'bras bu dang // mya ngan med pa'i me tog bcas //
translated: together with the flower of the aśoka,

original: sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas te /
analyzed: sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas te /
translated: Having performed five thousand burnt offerings,

original: mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram gyi //
analyzed: mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram gyi //
translated: with ghee, honey, and molasses,

original: sbyin sreg bu mo bsgrub la bsngags ;
analyzed: sbyin sreg bu mo bsgrub la bsngags ;
translated: the burnt offering is praised for the attainment of a girl.

original: / de ni zhag bdun sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: / de ni zhag bdun sbyor ba yis //
translated: Then, within seven days,

original: rang 'dod bu mo thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang 'dod bu mo thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will obtain a girl of one's choice.

original: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /🔽aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka aa bhi dh'a n'am svasth'a na te a'a karsha ya ma m'anti ke dza:sngags 'di rgya shug gi tsher ma la stong phrag lnga lnga bzlas shing rang byung gi me tog la bsnyugs shing sbyin sreg byas na 'dis rgyal
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka aa bhi dh'a n'am svasth'a na te a'a karsha ya ma m'anti ke dza:sngags 'di rgya shug gi tsher ma la stong phrag lnga lnga bzlas shing rang byung gi me tog la bsnyugs shing sbyin sreg byas na 'dis rgyal
translated: Then, one should apply it to others as well.🔽Om Tare Tuttare Ture Amukam Abhidhanam Svasthana Te Akarsaya Manantike Jva

original: po'i bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: po'i bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do //
translated: Reciting this mantra five thousand times on jujube thorns, fumigating with self-arisen flowers and performing burnt offerings, even the daughter of a king will be summoned by this.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should apply it to others as well.

original: rang byung gi me tog gis bskus pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lcags kyu dang autpa la'i zhags pa bsnams pa bris la /
analyzed: rang byung gi me tog gis bskus pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lcags kyu dang autpa la'i zhags pa bsnams pa bris la /
translated: One should draw the Blessed One with one face and two hands, holding a hook and an utpala noose, on a cloth smeared with self-arisen flowers.

original: de'i mdun du /
analyzed: de'i mdun du /
translated: In front of that,

original: lha rdzas me tog dam pa 'di //
analyzed: lha rdzas me tog dam pa 'di //
translated: With these and other offerings, one should worship the sublime, divine flower.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas la phyi nas bsgom pa dad ldan pas bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas la phyi nas bsgom pa dad ldan pas bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Then, the faithful one should recite the mantra.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki ma ma ae pa tsi tam svam pna ka th'a ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ki ma ma ae pa tsi tam svam pna ka th'a ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture amuki mama evaṃ citaṃ svāṃ pākaṭhāya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: [The object of the rite] will arrive within five thousand [recitations].

original: zhags pas ske bcings te lcags kyus phug nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i mthil du bsams te bran mo'i gzugs kyis spyad par bya'o ;
analyzed: zhags pas ske bcings te lcags kyus phug nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i mthil du bsams te bran mo'i gzugs kyis spyad par bya'o ;
translated: Binding the neck with a noose and piercing with a goad, one should imagine the victim on the soles of one's feet and enjoy [her] in the form of a servant.

original: / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Next, there is another application.

original: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te bdag nyid kyi mig gnyis la byugs nas rgyal po'i rigs kyi nang du zhugs na de nas rgyal po dang bcas pa slob mar gyur pas gus par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te bdag nyid kyi mig gnyis la byugs nas rgyal po'i rigs kyi nang du zhugs na de nas rgyal po dang bcas pa slob mar gyur pas gus par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted the Tārā mantra seven times and anointed one's own two eyes, if one enters among the royal class, then the king and so forth will become one's disciples and will pay homage.

original: 'gal bar smra bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gal bar smra bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not speak in contradiction.

original: dad pas 'bul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dad pas 'bul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be offered with faith.

original: dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will have delightful conversation.

original: de'i g-yog byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i g-yog byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be their servant.

original: khro ba yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khro ba yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be able to control anger.

original: mthong ba'i rkyen du yang dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i rkyen du yang dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will be able to see them.

original: de nas gzhan la yang sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then one will be able to apply this to others.

original: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya bzlas nas sprul gdong gnyis pa'i mgo thal bar @134a * //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya bzlas nas sprul gdong gnyis pa'i mgo thal bar @134a * //
translated: Having recited the Tārā dhāraṇī one hundred times, one should reduce the head of a two-faced snake to ashes,

original: byas te / ba dmar mo'i mar la aarka'i ba la la sdong bu byas te rab tu sbar nas mig sman byas te /
analyzed: byas te / ba dmar mo'i mar la aarka'i ba la la sdong bu byas te rab tu sbar nas mig sman byas te /
translated: make an ointment with the ashes and red cow’s ghee, and light a lamp with a stick of arka wood.

original: de'i mig sman dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje chos dag mnyes shing rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mig sman dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje chos dag mnyes shing rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o //
translated: One should please the eye ointment, Vajrasūrya, and Vajradharma, and fumigate with the best incense.

original: thal ba dang lhan cig mig sman byas nas gang la rdo rje'i mig gis bltas pa de'i gal de padma gar dbang 'dzag par ma gyur na de'i tshe sgro la ma bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nges par bslus pa yin no //
analyzed: thal ba dang lhan cig mig sman byas nas gang la rdo rje'i mig gis bltas pa de'i gal de padma gar dbang 'dzag par ma gyur na de'i tshe sgro la ma bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nges par bslus pa yin no //
translated: Having made an ointment with the ashes, if one looks with the vajra eye at someone and if their lotus does not drip with the lord of dance, then at that time the Blessed Lady has deceived me.

original: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should apply it to others.

original: so ma skyes pa'i bu chung gi kha chub blangs nas sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te /
analyzed: so ma skyes pa'i bu chung gi kha chub blangs nas sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te /
translated: One should take the saliva of a young boy who has not yet walked, incant it seven times with the Tārā mantra,

original: bhring ga r'a dza'i rtsa ba dang / gi wang dang lhan cig tu byas nas dpral bar thig le byas na gang dang gang la bltas pa de dang de dbang du 'gyur te gzhan la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bhring ga r'a dza'i rtsa ba dang / gi wang dang lhan cig tu byas nas dpral bar thig le byas na gang dang gang la bltas pa de dang de dbang du 'gyur te gzhan la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and make a bindi on one’s forehead with the root of bṛṃgārava mixed with bovine orpiment. Whomever one looks at will be enthralled and will not take pleasure in others.

original: gzhan la mi 'gro zhing rang spong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la mi 'gro zhing rang spong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not go to others and will not abandon oneself.

original: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should apply it to others.

original: lto ba'i srin bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te rdo rje chos dang bcas te so rtsi gzhon nu ma la byin nas des longs spyad na sbyor ba'i mchog 'di mi spong zhing gzhan la dga' bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: lto ba'i srin bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs lan bdun mngon par bsngags te rdo rje chos dang bcas te so rtsi gzhon nu ma la byin nas des longs spyad na sbyor ba'i mchog 'di mi spong zhing gzhan la dga' bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: One should incant seven times with the Tārā mantra the saliva of a young girl who is a tooth cleaner, and give it to her to chew together with Vajradharma. If she uses it, she will not abandon this supreme practice and will not take pleasure in others.

original: gzhan la mi 'gro bar rang gi bdag po yang spong bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhan la mi 'gro bar rang gi bdag po yang spong bar mi byed do //
translated: He will not abandon his own master, let alone another.

original: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should apply it to another.

original: zhag chen po rang gi lus la byugs te /
analyzed: zhag chen po rang gi lus la byugs te /
translated: One should anoint one’s own body with human fat,

original: sgrol ma'i gzungs khri phrag gcig bzlas te bsgom pa dang ldan pas bzlas pa'i mthar 'bras s'a lu'i zan gyi dril phyis byas pa'i dri ma bsdus te gang la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzungs khri phrag gcig bzlas te bsgom pa dang ldan pas bzlas pa'i mthar 'bras s'a lu'i zan gyi dril phyis byas pa'i dri ma bsdus te gang la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and having recited the Tārā dhāraṇī ten thousand times, one should collect the smell of the dough of rice flour at the end of the recitation. Whoever is given this will not be abandoned for as long as one lives.

original: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should apply it to another.

original: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas shing bsnyen pa byas la /
analyzed: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas shing bsnyen pa byas la /
translated: At the time of the lunar eclipse, one should recite the Tārā dhāraṇī and perform the approach.

original: de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs la dung gi phye mar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs la dung gi phye mar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should take the Lokeśvara that arises from that and mix it with conch powder.

original: de gang la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gang la byin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whoever is given this will follow for as long as one lives.

original: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan la yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should apply it to another.

original: sgrol ma'i gzungs myos byed kyi 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te 'bras bu de rta mgrin dang lhan cig tu byas nas byugs na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzungs myos byed kyi 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te 'bras bu de rta mgrin dang lhan cig tu byas nas byugs na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: Enchanting a fruit of Datura one hundred and eight times, one should apply that fruit together with Hayagrīva. He will be brought under one’s power.

original: de nas gzhan du yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan du yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, one should also apply it elsewhere.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo'i bandha na muktim ku ru:sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo'i bandha na muktim ku ru:sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture, liberate the bonds of so-and-so, svāhā.

original: sngags 'dis aarka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming bar du bcug ste yang dag par @134b bris nas srin bu sdig pa'i tshad du sngags na bcings pa las grol par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags 'dis aarka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming bar du bcug ste yang dag par @134b bris nas srin bu sdig pa'i tshad du sngags na bcings pa las grol par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having written the name of the person to be liberated in the middle of an arka leaf with this mantra, if one recites the mantra until it is the size of a scorpion, he will be liberated from bondage.

original: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Vajratārā is complete.
